get.summary: Convert the given amount base on source and destination currency and the reference date

parameters.name: src_currency
parameters.description: Source currency of the amount to convert

parameters.name: dest_currency
parameters.description: Destination currency of the amount to convert

parameters.name: reference_date
parameters.description: Date of the actual exchange rate in format YYYY-MM-DD

404.description: Failed. One of src_currency, dest_currency or reference date not found.

500.description: Failed. An internal error occurred while processing the request.
